Verses: 1 karththaave, En Saththurukkal Ennai Merkondu Magizhavottaamal, Neer Ennaik Kaithookki Eduththabadiyinaal, Naan Ummaip Potruven.
2 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppitten, Ennai Neer Gunamaakkineer.
3 karththaave, Neer En Aaththumaavaip Paadhaalaththilirundhu Erappanni, Naan Kuzhiyil Irangaadhabadi Ennai Uyirode Kaaththeer.
4 karththarudaiya Parisuththavaangale, Avaraik Keerththanampanni, Avarudaiya Parisuththaththin Ninaivukoorudhalaik Kondaadungal.
5 avarudaiya Kobam Oru Nimisham, Avarudaiya Dhayavo Neediya Vaazhvu; Saayangaalaththil Azhugai Thangum, Vidiyarkaalaththile Kalippundaagum.
6 naan Orukkaalum Asaikkappaduvadhillaiyendru En Vaazhvile Sonnen.
7 karththaave, Ummudaiya Dhayavinaal Neer En Parvadhaththaith Thidamaai Nirkappanniyirundheer; Umadhu Mugaththai Neer Maraiththukkondabodho Naan Kalanginavanaanen.
8 naan Kuzhiyil Irangugaiyil En Raththaththaal Enna Laabamundu? Puzhudhi Ummaith Thudhiththu, Umadhu Saththiyaththai Arivikkumo?
9 karththaave, Neer Enakkuch Sevikoduththu Enmel Irakkamaayirum; Karththaave, Neer Enakkuch Sagaayaraayirum Endru Solli;
10 karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppitten; Karththarai Nokkik Kenjinen.
11 en Pulambalai Aanandhak Kalippaaga Maarappannineer; En Magimai Amarndhiraamal Ummaik Keerththanampannumpadiyaaga Neer En Irattaik Kalaindhupottu, Magizhchchiyennum Kattinaal Ennai Idaikattineer.
12 en Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummai Endrendraikkum Thudhippen.
